DOC.brief_summary: Retinal blood flow velocity is affected by Bevacizump intravitreal injection. This effect is correlated to treatment success.
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of the study was to carry out a pilot study on the short-term effect of intravitreal Bevacizumab (Avastin) injection on retinal blood-flow velocity and test whether the short-term haemodynamic changes could predict the longer term clinical result of the treatment.
DOC.criteria: Patients with CNV receiving Bevacizumab intravitreal injection Candidates in whom the retina could not be seen clearly because of media opacity or a poorly dilating pupil
